attributes.action: Make it Illegal for my girlfriend to withhold sex
attributes.additional_details:
Dear Sir or Madam,

I am writing to protest a grave injustice. My girlfriend has unfairly barred me from sex, cruelly and without mercy. I request that the government pass a new law forcing my beloved to overturn this callous and thoughtless decision and to put in place laws to stop this travesty of justice ever happening to me, or any british citizen ever again.
